name: Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation
description: Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation is a leading provider of advanced digital manufacturing solutions, specializing in additive manufacturing, 3D printing, and rapid prototyping services. Founded in 2021, Fathom has quickly established itself as an innovative force in the manufacturing sector, leveraging state-of-the-art technologies to deliver high-quality, customized production solutions across various industries. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including design optimization, material selection, and post-processing, enabling clients to streamline their product development processes while reducing costs and lead times. With a focus on sustainability, Fathom utilizes eco-friendly materials and processes, aligning with the growing demand for responsible manufacturing practices. The company’s mission is to empower businesses by providing them with the tools and capabilities to innovate and excel in today’s competitive landscape. Fathom serves a diverse range of sectors including aerospace, automotive, healthcare, and consumer products, and has built a reputation for delivering exceptional results through its expertise and customer-centric approach.

seo.meta_title: Fathom Digital Manufacturing | Advanced 3D Printing Solutions
seo.meta_description: Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation provides cutting-edge additive manufacturing and rapid prototyping services. Learn about our innovative solutions and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What services does Fathom offer?
faq.answer: Fathom offers advanced digital manufacturing solutions including additive manufacturing, rapid prototyping, and design optimization.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fathom?
faq.answer: Ryan Martin is the CEO of Fathom Digital Manufacturing Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Fathom headquartered?
faq.answer: Fathom is headquartered in Oakland, California, USA.

faq.question: What industries does Fathom serve?
faq.answer: Fathom serves various industries including aerospace, automotive, healthcare, and consumer products.
